children.text: In this chapter, unless the context indicates otherwise—
label: 4a860943d9f0bc294a1698eaec498b16

children.text: Act means the Social Security Act, and titles referred to are titles of that Act. sort
label: 275d5c592b97328bdadf04a01872b48c

children.text: Administrator means the Administrator, Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS), formerly the Health Care Financing Administration (HCFA).
label: 525464db6901e3dfb9c7ce6fb8254582

children.text: ALJ stands for administrative law judge.
label: 1e962a546dc32cc2e67654bfd9b4ff5d

children.text: Area means the geographical area within the boundaries of a State, or a State or other jurisdiction, designated as constituting an area with respect to which a Professional Standards Review Organization or a Utilization and Quality Control Peer Review Organization has been or may be designated.
label: 5135750c63881fb9d6d4de36dcb8b580

children.text: Beneficiary means a person who is entitled to Medicare benefits and/or has been determined to be eligible for Medicaid.
label: 696bb197bdfae2619eb28faf6a51ecf0

children.text: CMP stands for competitive medical plan.
label: 12b6610f3bbf669d79c028f862836f0d

children.text: Conditions of participation includes requirements for participation as the latter term is used in part 483 of this chapter.
label: d4f7f87f71fd0c7db5ad45cd9ba0820b

children.text: Condition level deficiencies includes deficiencies with respect to “level A requirements” as the latter term is used in parts 442 and 483 of this chapter.
label: 958360178491f098586d6a1f14b5e568

children.text: CORF stands for comprehensive outpatient rehabilitation facility.
label: f2c992a751c43935d1d58cf546aca242

children.text: CFR stands for Code of Federal Regulations.
label: 02a29cf9f062e8ec285c82f8245cb215

children.text: CMS stands for Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services, formerly the Health Care Financing Administration (HCFA).
label: 454c4097100c558e5f106d788693d857

children.text: CY stands for calendar year.
label: 548b39ad29189858357c378da97f91b1

children.text: DAB stands for Departmental Appeals Board.
label: 905643977b77cff16d3bff61641fc296

children.text: Department means the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS), formerly the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare.
label: e4c693228d665b39cb864c6e8ec4c976

children.text: ESRD stands for end-stage renal disease.
label: a34c56e0c2577709f3ab68f601cf7524

children.text: FDA stands for the Food and Drug Administration.
label: 151a7f15351961cdd1c78287183d0c88

children.text: FQHC means Federally qualified health center.
label: b2b3b745379f3048397c47699b49fd94

children.text: FR stands for Federal Register.
label: dedc99702bfb605119034f39a14ee781

children.text: FY stands for fiscal year.
label: 7992f51cc0d7482b22d3a761519a64fc

children.text: HCPP stands for health care prepayment plan.
label: 8070cd9dcacb8f0282338272dd5f4f3f

children.text: HHS stands for the Department of Health and Human Services.
label: 6926ab7aa7d024ab7eed2a32eb5355db

children.text: HHA stands for home health agency.
label: b61d03fb2dabd318e3d91501cc1e9dc5

children.text: HMO stands for health maintenance organization.
label: 0325f02fc47c78854c49c0c78ae90ccd

children.text: ICF stands for intermediate care facility.
label: b8b3db7adf100ebec1cf818169415830

children.text: ICF/IID stands for intermediate care facility for individuals with intellectual disabilities.
label: 918750a53b5b925ea06f5348e88f0537

children.text: Medicaid means medical assistance provided under a State plan approved under title XIX of the Act.
label: e09da6100ecb690b68c144ac0685bd7f

children.text: Medicare means the health insurance program for the aged and disabled under title XVIII of the Act.
label: 6a7b1017eb78751ad6e0a680af4ee080

children.text: Medicare Savings Programs (MSPs) has the same meaning described in § 435.4 of this chapter.
label: bc26caa3e7f9fb54d0f664369934349f

children.text: NCD stands for national coverage determination.
label: 5f69592745fb2ebfd88d2a36d6e3755d

children.text: OASDI stands for the Old Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance program under title II of the Act.
label: b32a17809aa8d27a9af4c6ddfdb33aa7

children.text: OIG stands for the Department's Office of the Inspector General.
label: 573b399e60bd4b1a4e3d161fa648b2c0

children.text: Public Health Emergency (PHE) means the Public Health Emergency determined to exist nationwide as of January 27, 2020, by the Secretary pursuant to section 319 of the Public Health Service Act on January 31, 2020, as a result of confirmed cases of COVID–19, including any subsequent renewals.
label: 4d36a6d6227b41fae614f87e8e5a04c8

children.text: QDWI stands for Qualified Disabled and Working Individual.
label: 564e52092fff00f8c8fbfa3e2754ec45

children.text: QIO stands for quality improvement organization.
label: 1842c850f9d0859f436b66258e416c23

children.text: QMB stands for Qualified Medicare Beneficiary.
label: b4b08860344a5ac643f62df188019549

children.text: Qualified Disabled and Working Individual means an individual who—
label: 021dfdb92a89025b85e976623e4ed8e9

children.text: (1) Is eligible to enroll for Medicare Part A under section 1818A of the Act.
label: 509d42ea9541511c19b0f44c21bf4e27

children.text: (2) Has income, as determined in accordance with SSI methodologies, that does not exceed 200 percent of the Federal poverty guidelines (as defined and revised annually by the Office of Management and Budget) for a family of the size of the individual's family;
label: 882dc65fb2ac7ccc02a72a64b277bea0

children.text: (3) Has resources, as determined in accordance with SSI methodologies, that do not exceed twice the relevant maximum amount established, for SSI eligibility, for an individual or for an individual and his or her spouse; and
label: 17087e5f6bde279d32072d67177e29d5

children.text: (4) Is not otherwise eligible for Medicaid.
label: 70c61957590fe70ba6751ad20b91b266

children.text: Qualified Medicare Beneficiary (QMB) means an individual described in § 435.123 of this chapter.
label: 420a1672573436abcfb9b17b87e7d557

children.text: Qualifying Individual (QI) means an individual described in § 435.125 of this chapter.
label: 84795cde5f078f6a16197f3525c2c790

children.text: Quality improvement organization means an organization that has a contract with CMS, under part B of title XI of the Act, to perform utilization and quality control review of the health care furnished, or to be furnished, to Medicare beneficiaries.
label: 675ac0e3ddd5c2bc9db78c66edf7ba7f

children.text: Regional Administrator means a Regional Administrator of CMS.
label: fded0333f0aba524b28c2b7e07f13700

children.text: Regional Office means one of the regional offices of CMS.
label: f0ce49c78493c493016008b014476115

children.text: RHC stands for rural health clinic.
label: 3ad1d494ae7ef1f6a287aad71540fa71

children.text: RRB stands for Railroad Retirement Board.
label: c31f49216f8ae5806fb81d225512b179

children.text: Secretary means the Secretary of Health and Human Services.
label: d6627750fb374eb679db97c93c5c1356

children.text: SNF stands for skilled nursing facility.
label: 23b1df3970057fdd73d2fd3ba672e027

children.text: Social security benefits means monthly cash benefits payable under section 202 or 223 of the Act.
label: ec9fcd8555029c822bdeead58e92da69

children.text: Specified Low-Income Medicare Beneficiary (SLMB) means an individual described in § 435.124 of this chapter.
label: a582a14b29c30fb6d179ec79e4009f54

children.text: SSA stands for Social Security Administration.
label: 5faa8f71c6fb8e9dc60fcf8be19e1921

children.text: United States means the fifty States, the District of Columbia, the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, Guam, American Samoa, and the Northern Mariana Islands.
label: b05bfca1bdd46d1f4fcfe5182e79c16d

children.text: U.S.C. stands for United States Code.
label: d58852687102f54c7da7f5b67903fc2f

children.text: As used in connection with the Medicare program, unless the context indicates otherwise—
label: 61b4064875cea6bed25557e4bdbffcf6

children.text: Carrier means an entity that has a contract with CMS to determine and make Medicare payments for Part B benefits payable on a charge basis and to perform other related functions.
label: 773853e6908fb8c1c471858f59543970

children.text: Critical access hospital (CAH) means a facility designated by HFCA as meeting the applicable requirements of section 1820 of the Act and of subpart F of part 485 of this chapter.
label: 05ef255f0cc176a3b6d888fa4e97ba37

children.text: Departmental Appeals Board means: (1) Except as provided in paragraphs (2) and (3) of this definition, a Board established in the office of the Secretary, whose members act in panels to provide impartial review of disputed decisions made by operating components of the Department or by ALJs.
label: 2fd6775be6af1ecbf6482c68a25a21b8

children.text: (2) For purposes of review of ALJ decisions under part 405, subparts G and H; part 417, subpart Q; part 422, subpart M; and part 478, subpart B of this chapter, the Medicare Appeals Council designated by the Board Chair.
label: 04d2672f2923a48a5ea6d4605cb6af54

children.text: (3) For purposes of part 426 of this chapter, a Member of the Board and, at the discretion of the Board Chair, any other Board staff appointed by the Board Chair to perform a review under that part.
label: a309ed0d39ebcc14e65c2ddf54c377d3

children.text: Entitled means that an individual meets all the requirements for Medicare benefits.
label: 78104ab813d0407e3daf579af15f5652

children.text: Essential access community hospital (EACH) means a hospital designated by CMS as meeting the applicable requirements of section 1820 of the Act and of subpart G of part 412 of this chapter, as in effect on September 30, 1997.
label: a67d2cca8d838196114027349cda4dcc

children.text: GME stands for graduate medical education.
label: c98e01ee28fcc579278d422a990139a7

children.text: Hospital insurance benefits means payments on behalf of, and in rare circumstances directly to, an entitled individual for services that are covered under Part A of title XVIII of the Act.
label: ec7f623a23cb06ad288d1e603d2299dc

children.text: Intermediary means an entity that has a contract with CMS to determine and make Medicare payments for Part A or Part B benefits payable on a cost basis and to perform other related functions.
label: 31f677ca9a39db670e42b89d7c90f5c0

children.text: Local coverage determination (LCD) means a decision by a fiscal intermediary or a carrier under Medicare Part A or Part B, as applicable, whether to cover a particular service on an intermediary-wide or carrier-wide basis in accordance with section 1862(a)(1)(A) of the Act. An LCD may provide that a service is not reasonable and necessary for certain diagnoses and/or for certain diagnosis codes. An LCD does not include a determination of which procedure code, if any, is assigned to a service or a determination with respect to the amount of payment to be made for the service.
label: a2b9d3f260c698ed38115abe5372d450

children.text: Medicare integrity program contractor means an entity that has a contract with CMS under section 1893 of the Act to perform exclusively one or more of the program integrity activities specified in that section.
label: 1feca569414800be17abf257fdbc8edb

children.text: Medicare Part A means the hospital insurance program authorized under Part A of title XVIII of the Act.
label: f4a9edaff0f9a4d8be91fe5de5d98cfd

children.text: Medicare Part B means the supplementary medical insurance program authorized under Part B of title XVIII of the Act.
label: 1afffcec07e98179ffbe31b16e78b7dd

children.text: Medicare Part C means the choice of Medicare benefits through Medicare Advantage plans authorized under Part C of the title XVIII of the Act.
label: 1a7d19215d00b5f1b4b6455e23d87935

children.text: Medicare Part D means the voluntary prescription drug benefit program authorized under Part D of title XVIII of the Act.
label: 9aaf7bcad6450a57b537abc3e1d261ae

children.text: National coverage determination (NCD) means a decision that CMS makes regarding whether to cover a particular service nationally under title XVIII of the Act. An NCD does not include a determination of what code, if any, is assigned to a service or a determination with respect to the amount of payment to be made for the service.
label: b905294cbfba035d185596d2a6916980

children.text: Nonparticipating supplier means a supplier that does not have an agreement with CMS to participate in Part B of Medicare in effect on the date of the service.
label: 9d01d9f36c8c14a9e681a68664a03dcf

children.text: Participating supplier means a supplier that has an agreement with CMS to participate in Part B of Medicare in effect on the date of the service.
label: 4d126988f3572d85814a28d2b31d82a6

children.text: Payment on an assignment-related basis means payment for Part B services—
label: d93e1a50264bc9832fce84690908d450

children.text: (1) To a physician or other supplier that accepts assignment from the beneficiary, in accordance with § 424.55 or § 424.56 of this chapter;
label: 1d2b5410496de55414fe90d693ae167e

children.text: (2) To a physician or other supplier after the beneficiary's death, in accordance with § 424.64(c)(1) of this chapter; or
label: 1e27ad4e07bd0102a10e8c7bebf5d523

children.text: (3) To an entity that pays the physician or other supplier under a health benefit plan, in accordance with § 424.66 of this chapter.
label: 71e75b34a717a87ebe00363235ac11cb

children.text: Provider means a hospital, a CAH, a skilled nursing facility, a comprehensive outpatient rehabilitation facility, a home health agency, or a hospice that has in effect an agreement to participate in Medicare, or a clinic, a rehabilitation agency, or a public health agency that has in effect a similar agreement but only to furnish outpatient physical therapy or speech pathology services, or a community mental health center that has in effect a similar agreement but only to furnish partial hospitalization services.
label: be9c1eb8d47fd782341e0690fa884faf

children.text: Railroad retirement benefits means monthly benefits payable to individuals under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 (45 U.S.C. beginning at section 231).
label: c0c79b147991565fc114a631fdae9b67

children.text: Services means medical care or services and items, such as medical diagnosis and treatment, drugs and biologicals, supplies, appliances, and equipment, medical social services, and use of hospital, CAH, or SNF facilities.
label: 634e9a8a58ddf15ac3089be4418971f0

children.text: Supplementary medical insurance benefits means payment to or on behalf of an entitled individual for services covered under Part B of title XVIII of the Act.
label: 082760a9524120bbe763bd7ff6c3bc28

children.text: Supplier means a physician or other practitioner, or an entity other than a provider, that furnishes health care services under Medicare.
label: ebf64b000d72ad6003ed9c8fd2028f5a

children.text: As used in connection with the Medicaid program, unless the context indicates otherwise—
label: c0fc1947f5f07d2160e1ec9689e5f31c

children.text: Applicant means an individual whose written application for Medicaid has been submitted to the agency determining Medicaid eligibility, but has not received final action. This includes an individual (who need not be alive at the time of application) whose application is submitted through a representative or a person acting responsibly for the individual.
label: f54e7c58bd10ffb0a1bd88cd252c8233

children.text: Federal financial participation (FFP) means the Federal Government's share of a State's expenditures under the Medicaid program.
label: 6d215aa9f24dd42a0b695da75498f010

children.text: FMAP stands for the Federal medical assistance percentage, which is used to calculate the amount of Federal share of State expenditures for services.
label: f022d14cf18f3fbc60ce5a2eea2f6f90

children.text: Intellectual disability means the condition that was previously referred to as mental retardation.
label: 3b7cfa84898534d270c13dbba1dafaab

children.text: Medicaid agency or agency means the single State agency administering or supervising the administration of a State Medicaid plan.
label: 90a4862d3149c0f013e7642b088b0550

children.text: Nursing facility (NF), effective October 1, 1990, means an SNF or an ICF participating in the Medicaid program.
label: 9e46dbc9b29465cfe0e91026966d0429

children.text: PCCM stands for primary care case manager.
label: 90713563071f0cc5d961348f7e5a6c9f

children.text: PCP stands for primary care physician.
label: dca8523ad257b175f99e04d180be39d3

children.text: Provider means either of the following:
label: 7e41793e0a4b00faa59c24c3161cdca2

children.text: (1) For the fee-for-service program, any individual or entity furnishing Medicaid services under an agreement with the Medicaid agency.
label: 4362a432e2f0dcd454b4f545a86d3766

children.text: (2) For the managed care program, any individual or entity that is engaged in the delivery of health care services and is legally authorized to do so by the State in which it delivers the services.
label: 3bf3db8bbfe9dfb07ff922701520cca6

children.text: Services means the types of medical assistance specified in section 1905(a) of the Act and defined in subpart A of part 440 of this chapter.
label: 4f681b309bb482ae00801a24a784be12

children.text: State means the several States, the District of Columbia, the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, Guam, American Samoa and the Northern Mariana Islands.
label: d0931f6317610555a97615051113a840

children.text: State plan or the plan means a comprehensive written commitment by a Medicaid agency, submitted under section 1902(a) of the Act, to administer or supervise the administration of a Medicaid program in accordance with Federal requirements.
label: 91e611da6a28317016529a93ff20b8b0

depth_stack.label: Chapter IV - Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services, Department of Health and Human Services
depth_stack.label_description: Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services, Department of Health and Human Services

children.label: Chapter IV - Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services, Department of Health and Human Services
children.label_description: Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services, Department of Health and Human Services
